title: Latest Expert RAW update boosts low light performance
content:
Originally exclusive to the Galaxy S22 Ultra and Galaxy S21 Ultra, Samsung recently expanded the Expert RAW camera app to several other Galaxy flagships. Expert RAW is a powerful app that lets you take full control of your photos by allowing you to shoot in RAW and offering full manual camera controls like shutter speed

The post Latest Expert RAW update boosts low light performance appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Expert RAW version 1.0.01 has started rolling out to supported Galaxy phones. The latest update improves image clarity in low light photos.
